Sentencas: An innovative cogeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and copper chlorine cycle is being investigated.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: Instead of directly making electricity by any thermodynamic cycle or thermoelectric generator, the waste heat from SOFC should be used to make hydrogen through the copper-chlorine cycle (Cu-Cl).
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: A portable polymer exchange membrane fuel cell (PEMFC) has been suggested due to its compatibility with portable and non-portable applications.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: The obtained results reveal that increasing the current density of SOFC results in higher methane consumption, output power, overpotentials, and hydrogen production.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: Furthermore, temperature variation does not have as much influence on power generation and efficiency as current density, where the system efficiency, when operating at 0.7 A/cm2 and SOFC operating temperature of 900-1200 K, varies between 40.4 % and 46.3 %.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: Regarding the methane flow rate, as it increases, the output power increases as well, but the efficiency falls.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: The system's greatest power output is 677.5 kW and occurs at a methane flow rate of 2.13 mol/s, although the system efficiency is just 39.7 % at that point.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: Most importantly, SOFC generates nearly 65 % of the total power, while PEMFC generates around 35 %.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle

Sentencas: Therefore, the percentage of additional power that PEMFC can produce is around 55 %.
Titulo: Electricity and hydrogen production by integrating two kinds of fuel cells with copper chlorine thermo-chemical cycle
